reviewText: Great series, acting, writing top notch, always delivers the unexpected.
Great series! A must have for all crime drama fans!
Received my discs and will watch them one long weekend.
Would not play on Panasonic blue ray player either.  All firmware up to date.  Bummer.
Love this series and I was finally able to get this on blu ray. Thanks
Incredible series. This is like a darker version of the british "Sherlock". Excellent acting and writing. Another great series from BBC!
Been looking for this, for many months. Watched most on Netflix. But wanted the real thing. Great price/ value and ensures you have all series/ episodes.
This will not play on a Sony Blu-ray device.
